item.title: Updated git2rss script and config file
item.author: John Simpson

description.pre:
Commit: c8e2d4a1826f86b74ae9d46cfd1dc1876ccc59fb Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Sat, 29 Jul 2023 13:15:19 -0400
Updated git2rss script and config file
M .git2rss M git2rss

Commit: 66db2737ea4d43ae69c51dd086b4a74f28aad85f Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Thu, 27 Jul 2023 21:52:14 -0400
Added `git2rss` script/config, updated README.md
A .git2rss M Makefile M README.md A git2rss

Commit: 9b439e69cd093b4e42b98d83c2fe227baf49ac96 Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Mon, 3 Jul 2023 16:45:52 -0400
Updated #! line in version-commit script
to use the first `perl` in the PATH, instead of from a fixed location. Helpful when you're using `perl` from Homebrew, and need to be sure that compiled modules match the `perl` executable you're using.
M version-commit

Commit: 53bf7730db462095dfcaf0203e5c2f8f123f52ee Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Tue, 15 Nov 2022 00:23:53 -0500
Updated `setup-gh-pages` script
- Make sure git is v2.0.7 or later. - If the book has already been generated at least once, copy the generated book to the work directory before creating the initial commit in the `gh-pages` branch.
M README.md M setup-gh-pages

item.title: Minor updates to `README.md`, and to the comments in `Makefile`.
item.author: John Simpson

description.pre:
Commit: 6f8d6a1cdc8d99202f390137f673bc33c9bd2710 Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Fri, 7 Oct 2022 13:18:42 -0400
Minor updates to `README.md`, and to the comments in `Makefile`.
M Makefile M README.md

Commit: 3d8ba2ef7b35ce273cd71caf4292f7e31ba3e2d2 Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Mon, 18 Jul 2022 20:05:35 -0400
Added 'cp CNAME' to 'make gh-pages' target
- This file tells Github Pages what custom hostname to use for the generated site.
M Makefile

item.title: NOT commenting out version-commit page footer
item.author: John Simpson

description.pre:
Commit: 8025537a922026589b0fd854a21ad84e9f7126da Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Tue, 7 Jun 2022 19:37:16 -0400
NOT commenting out version-commit page footer
- This allows people looking at the online preview to see what the version block at the bottom of each page will look like.
M theme/index-template.hbs

Commit: 62debc7b72254208de14d686a7c2444439827ad1 Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Tue, 7 Jun 2022 19:35:49 -0400
Updated Makefile
- changed 'git add .' to 'git add -A', so it automatically removes any files which were removed from the working directory, from the repo.
M Makefile

Commit: 664ab5dddbb1b316d1be9fab2380c90890bd6395 Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Fri, 3 Jun 2022 18:03:32 -0400
More documentation tweaks.
Also added a commented out section in `theme/index-template.hbs` which if un-commented, will put the commit info and generation timestamp at the bottom of each page, so it will be included if somebody prints the book.
M README.md M book.toml M src/introduction.md M theme/index-template.hbs

Commit: 52238827b4959436bbad19abcba8ffec98644c64 Author: John Simpson <jms1> Date: Fri, 3 Jun 2022 16:36:11 -0400
Documentation tweaks
M README.md M src/introduction.md
